title: Features
description: See everything that Mue has to offer.

motivated.title: Get motivated
motivated.description: Mue has widgets to motivate you to succeed.
motivated.list_two: Greetings get you ready for the day.

customise.title: Customise your tab
customise.description: Mue has tons of options for customising it to make it right for you.
customise.list_one: Widget order and zoom allows you to position your widgets perfectly.
customise.list_two: Custom backgrounds, quotes, greetings and more
customise.list_three: Marketplace content to download packs from the community.

optimise.title: Optimise your workflow
optimise.description: Set Mue up to maximise your productivity for the day.
optimise.list_one: Search widget to easily find information from the web.
optimise.list_three: Notes allow you to keep track of what to do next.

secure.title: Safe and secure
secure.description: Mue comes with privacy features to keep your new tab secure and private.
secure.list_one: DuckDuckGo proxy to hide your IP address from websites Mue connects to.
secure.list_two: Offline mode to disable all requests.
